successes.description: World's First Wireless Smart In Ear Headphones. 1000 Songs. Performance Tracking. Body Sensors. Secure Fit.

Pledges.description:
THANK YOU! Every contribution brings us closer to our goal. 
We will keep you updated on the progress, and you will receive a $5 discount on a purchase from Bragi's online store.

Our CEO will send you a personal video message with a lot of love and a big thank you. We will keep you updated on the progress, and you will receive a $25 discount on a purchase from Bragi's online store.

THE DASH EARLY BIRD: a set of wireless in ear headphones for the early birds. You will be a tremendous help to make THE DASH come true. We can only offer a limited amount at this fantastic value. Suggested retail price $299! 
    EU residents (Germany, France, UK, etc.): Please add $34 for shipping and VAT (set amount to $213)

GET THE DASH: a set of wireless in ear headphones for the not so early birds, still a great offer $100 lower than the suggested retail price of $299.   EU residents(Germany, France, UK, etc...): Please add $38 for shipping and VAT (set amount to $237)

GET THE DASH A BIT LATER, BUT STILL AWESOME: a set of wireless in ear headphones for the not so early birds for DELIVERY IN JANUARY 2015, still a great offer $100 lower than the suggested retail price of $299. EU residents(Germany, France, UK, etc...): Please add $38 for shipping and VAT (set amount to $237)

GET THE DASH: a set of wireless in ear headphones, still a great offer $60 lower than the suggested retail price of $299. EU residents (Germany, France, UK, etc...): Please add $46 for shipping and VAT (set amount to $285)

THE DEVELOPER PACKAGE: You see the opportunity to integrate DASH functionality with your application? Get the developer package including a set of pre-series prototypes in July and access to the SDK and documentation. We will list you on our partner page on www.bragi.com when your application is finished.

THE DASH DEVELOPER SPECIAL: You see the opportunity to integrate DASH functionality with your application? Get the full developer package including a set of pre-series prototypes in July 2014 and the final product (estimated delivery October 2014) and access to the SDK and documentation.                                                         We will feature you on our partner page on www.bragi.com when your application is finished and available.

THE DASH ELITE DEVELOPER SPECIAL: You will receive the developer special and additional email and instant messaging hotline access to BRAGI. You will receive priority handling. You and a friend will be invited to Munich during the Oktoberfest. One day is spent at the BRAGI office, meeting the team and get a look behind the scenes. You and your friend will receive a traditional set of shirt, lederhosen and shoes or a traditional dress (Dirndl), and we will join you for a day of fun at the Octoberfest in Munich. A 3 nights stay in 2 single rooms or one double room at a 4 Star Hotel is included as well as limousine service from and to Munich airport. Flights are not included.
